common.title: Ownabee - Where Children's Imagination Becomes Books
common.description: Ownabee is an AI-powered creative storybook platform that transforms children's spoken or written stories into illustrated books with audio narration.
common.interfaceDescription: The intuitive interface is easy for children to use, and with the help of teachers or parents, they can create even richer stories.

hero.title: AI-Powered Storybooks for Children's Creativity
hero.subtitle: Ownabee helps children create their own personalized storybooks with the help of AI, fostering creativity and literacy skills.

journey.title: How It Works
journey.description: Introducing the creative journey children take with Ownabee. Through simple steps, your child's imagination becomes a real book.

audiobook.title: Bring Stories to Life
audiobook.description: Every story comes with professional-quality audio narration, helping children connect words with sounds.

features.title: Real Voice Learning
features.description: You can train it to learn any voice you want, such as your child's or parents'.

features.title: Various Voice Styles
features.description: Create audiobooks with a variety of trained voices.

meaning.title: Why Ownabee?
meaning.description: Ownabee comes from 'own' + 'story' + 'bee' - like busy bees, children create their own unique stories.
meaning.mainDescription: The name Ownabee represents our core mission of empowering children to create and own their stories.
meaning.description1: Children take ownership of their creative process and stories.
meaning.description2: Every child has unique stories waiting to be told and shared.
meaning.description3: Like busy bees, children work creatively to build something beautiful.

growth.title: Growth Through Creative Activities
growth.description: Ownabee is not just a book creation platform. It's an educational tool that helps children develop creativity and confidence as they create their own stories.

kindergarten.title: Why Kindergartens Need Ownabee
kindergarten.subtitle: Enhancing educational experiences through creative storytelling
kindergarten.description1: Engage children with interactive storytelling that makes learning fun and memorable
kindergarten.description2: Help children express and understand emotions through creative storytelling
kindergarten.description3: Provide tools for children to explore their imagination in a structured environment

usage.title: Ownabee in Kindergartens

tech.title: BeeGM AI
tech.description: Our AI technology creates high-quality illustrations and narration for children's stories.

voice.title: High-Quality AI Voice Synthesis
voice.description: Using 'BeeGM AI' technology to create natural, emotion-rich voices. We leverage the same technology used in 'SynchroU' broadcasts to deliver premium voice quality.

component1.title: Natural Language Processing
component1.description: Understands children's stories and extracts key elements for visualization.

component2.title: Image Generation
component2.description: Creates vibrant, child-friendly illustrations that match the story content.

component3.title: Voice Synthesis
component3.description: Transforms text into natural-sounding narration with appropriate pacing and emotion.
